data.title: Invest in the Edmonton Region
data.meta_description: Edmonton Global is a foreign direct investment (FDI) and international business development agency. Discover opportunities in the Edmonton region.
data.text:
Investing in the Edmonton region gives you access to a pool of talent fed by a world-class education system. With eight post-secondary institutions, and 130,000 students, we are home to a future-focused workforce.

The University of Alberta is ranked in the global top 100 and is a global leader in artificial intelligence and machine learning. The Northern Alberta Institute of Technology is the largest technology and apprenticeship trainer in Canada. The region graduates more engineers per capita than anywhere else in Canada – by a large margin.

Ranked as the best city for youth and youth work (Youthful Cities 2019), the Edmonton region is the second youngest metro region in Canada. Our friendly, affordable, and inclusive culture, make it easy for companies to attract and retain talent.

The Edmonton region was ranked as North America’s fastest growing tech ecosystem in 2021 according to CBRE.

Edmonton is home to the Alberta Machine Intelligence Institute (Amii), one of three Canadian AI Centres of Excellence. The region’s expertise in machine learning and reinforcement learning has attracted global companies including IBM, Google, Microsoft, Apple, and many more.

Outstanding breakthroughs in industries such as autonomous vehicles, clean tech, and nanotechnology are happening here, supported by world-class talent in state-of-the-art facilities.
